title: 07/23/21 DPS Hour 2 Tom Pelissero and Marc Spears
itunes:title: 07/23/21 DPS Hour 2 Tom Pelissero and Marc Spears
description:
Tom Pelissero talks to Dan about the new NFL rule concerning COVID-19 and players being vaccinated. Tom says the NFLPA were involved with all the protocols jointly. Marc Spears tells Dan that Giannis Antetokounmpo is the best player in the NBA, but that Kevin Durant is the best player in the world.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
